name: Hide nameplates which aren't casting (when one mob is casting)

description.text:
[url=https://zap-hosting.com/weakauras][img]https://screensaver01.zap-hosting.com/index.php/apps/files_sharing/publicpreview/FE97G8X3AZgiJx2?x=2548&y=941&a=true&file=banner%2520ad%25204k%25403x.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Donate-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=paypal&color=007CB1[/img][/url]

Hide nameplates of mobs that aren't casting if one of the mobs is casting. This doesn't cover all edge cases and doesn't work will all Nameplate addons
description.html: Hide nameplates of mobs that aren't casting if one of the mobs is casting. This doesn't cover all edge cases and doesn't work will all Nameplate addons

comments.text: @Jodsderechte afterwards send me a screenshot of the opened! table e.g. do /dev and open up the window and click on the "nameplate" entry to expand it (cause i need the frame name of the nameplate). This might not imediatly show it though so we might have to go a bit back and forth for it so ur best chances at getting this done swiftly is joining my discord to continue there

[taggeduser]@noskin[/taggeduser] sure but i need a couple of things from you to do so. please install https://github.com/brittyazel/DevTool

then target an enemy unit with a nameplate and run this macro

/run DevTool:AddData(C_NamePlate.GetNamePlateForUnit(unit),"nameplate")
Could you please consider adding support for NDui in future versions? Thank you.https://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info24846-NDui.html
